item.title: Advent of Emacs Lisp
item.description: I have been using Emacs for quite some time now, but so far I have never invested time to learn Emacs Lisp. I thought I could give a try at learning some basics using this year’s Advent of code. I am posting my progress in a repo in codeberg. Day 1 Hey, it’s my very first Emacs Lisp program. And I don’t have much time. And by one of these coincidences of the world, right when I had this thought of giving this a try, I saw this blog post pop up in my RSS feeds, pointing to a cool video by Gavin Freeborn explaining how to solve this challenge.
